title: JamesBorn
author: JamesBorn
content: If you're reliable bitcoin dealer i will wants to do business with you. I'm interested in buying bitcoin from you but first tell me your price rates or exchange rate? Tell me which medium I will receive it? Also your payment methods? Do you deliver first before payment or payment before transaction? If you're such trust dealer hit my DM for alignment. Thanks

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: JamesBorn on April 19, 2023, 06:35:28 PMIf you're reliable bitcoin dealer i will wants to do business with you. I'm interested in buying bitcoin from you but first tell me your price rates or exchange rate? Tell me which medium I will receive it? Also your payment methods? Do you deliver first before payment or payment before transaction? If you're such trust dealer hit my DM for alignment. ThanksMy rate: +5%.You will receive it at the address you provide, I can also send on lightning.I accept GBP and EUR. FPS, SEPA, SEPA Instant.You send the money first.Escrow accepted.

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Quote from: JamesBorn on April 19, 2023, 06:35:28 PMIf you're reliable bitcoin dealer i will wants to do business with you.You won't find much reputable dealers in the forum. I suggest you to use binance/kucoin p2p service for performing such activities. Its fast and secure for both parties.Quote from: alterra57 on April 19, 2023, 09:27:55 PMYou send the money first.Escrow accepted.SEPA is reversible. Always be cautious while accepting reversible form of payment methods. Using escrow might not help as well.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: Edwardard on April 21, 2023, 09:22:04 AMQuote from: JamesBorn on April 19, 2023, 06:35:28 PMIf you're reliable bitcoin dealer i will wants to do business with you.You won't find much reputable dealers in the forum. I suggest you to use binance/kucoin p2p service for performing such activities. Its fast and secure for both parties.Quote from: alterra57 on April 19, 2023, 09:27:55 PMYou send the money first.Escrow accepted.SEPA is reversible. Always be cautious while accepting reversible form of payment methods. Using escrow might not help as well.Thanks for the tip. I've been taking SEPA payments for a couple of years now and there are conditions that must be met for senders to ask for a reversal. Anyways, to kind of make it more secure I immediately buy crypto with it and so far it's been working. Also never had anyone ask for their money back but you never know.

comments.author: CryptoRollaOTC
comments.body: Quote from: JamesBorn on April 19, 2023, 06:35:28 PMIf you're reliable bitcoin dealer i will wants to do business with you. I'm interested in buying bitcoin from you but first tell me your price rates or exchange rate? Tell me which medium I will receive it? Also your payment methods? Do you deliver first before payment or payment before transaction? If you're such trust dealer hit my DM for alignment. ThanksIf trades need good and deep liquidity with fixed rate price %, and you have a genuine need and capacity to purchase we'd be happy to assist. Kind regards,CryptoRolla team

comments.author: Humanhen
comments.body: I can do this 1% fee using escrow
